RICHARD GILLIS v. WHITE OAK* CORPORATION ET AL. The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16911. James D. Moran, Jr., in support of the petition. *937Taka Iwashita and Michael J. Belzer, assistant attorneys general, in opposition. Decided January 14, 2003

The appeal was withdrawn March 28, 2003.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
